mapper.select: SELECT BID, EMAIL, BCONTENT, LEFT(BDATE, 10) BDATE, LEFT(BEDITDATE, 10) BEDITDATE FROM BOARD ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(BEDITDATE), BDATE, BEDITDATE) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( EMAIL, PASSWORD, BCONTENT, BDATE ) VALUES ( #{EMAIL}, #{PASSWORD}, #{BCONTENT}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT BID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, BCONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE BID = #{BID}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BCONTENT = #{BCONTENT}, BEDITDATE = NOW() WHERE BID = #{BID}
